headline: Oracle (ORCL) Valuation Check As Debt Funded AI Push And OpenAI Cloud Deal Draw Scrutiny
summary: Oracle (ORCL) is back in the spotlight after its aggressive push into AI infrastructure, funded largely with new debt tied to a long-term cloud partnership with OpenAI, raised fresh questions about risk and disclosure. See our latest analysis for Oracle. The latest AI infrastructure headlines land after a volatile stretch for Oracle’s shares, with a 1-year total shareholder return of 19.87% contrasted with a 90-day share price return decline of 31.06%. This suggests momentum has cooled even...
